definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Merely lid. How trivial it is.
Blepharitis is inflammation of the eyelid, usually from bacterial colonization.
sentences.chinese: 瞼緣炎是眼瞼的炎症，通常由細菌羣集而引起。

sentences.english: Palpebral subcutaneous round mass with different sizes.
sentences.chinese: 眼瞼皮下圓形質塊，大小不一。

sentences.english: Raise your lower eyelids if you can.
sentences.chinese: 擡起你的下眼瞼，如果你可以的話。

sentences.english: A nictitating membrane protects their large red-orange eyes.
sentences.chinese: 一層透明的眼瞼保護着他們橙紅色的大眼睛。

sentences.english: Wrinkles can also be reduced through blepharoplasty.
sentences.chinese: 皺紋也可以通過眼瞼整容術減少。

sentences.english: With her cloud-pale eyelids falling on dream-dimmed eyes;
sentences.chinese: 蒼雲般的眼瞼遮住夢幻般的眼睛。

sentences.english: Eyelids are forming and joints are bending.
sentences.chinese: 眼瞼正在形成，關節也可以彎曲了。

sentences.english: And press mine eyelids with thy kiss.
sentences.chinese: 輕壓我的眼瞼，用你的柔脣。

sentences.english: The upper minimizing eyelids from the corner of the eye to eye end oblique upper direction sprelisting; helps improve skin.
sentences.chinese: 高低眼瞼從眼角至眼尾斜上方向抹開，幫手提拔肌膚。

sentences.english: So it is very gentle on your eyelids.
sentences.chinese: 這對你的眼瞼是非常溫和的。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the role of patch test in eyelid eczematous dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討斑貼試驗在眼瞼皮炎溼疹中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the ideal therapeutic method for eye socket entourages hemangiomas of infants.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討治療嬰兒眼瞼眶周血管瘤的方法。

sentences.english: The upper minimizing eyelids from the corner of the eye to eye end oblique upper direction sprepost: helps improve skin.
sentences.chinese: 高低眼瞼從眼角至眼尾斜上方向抹開，輔助提拔肌膚。

sentences.english: These dolls feature closable eyelids and posable eyes.
sentences.chinese: 這些娃娃具有可閉眼瞼和仿真眼睛的特徵。

sentences.english: Inverted or everted eyelids are serious faults.
sentences.chinese: 眼瞼內翻或眼瞼外翻都屬於嚴重缺陷。

definition: temple (on the sides of human head)
to release/to let go/to loosen/to untie/to come loose
wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
to smudge (become smeared)/to smudge (create a blurred effect)/shading (wash painting technique)
